articles.title: Doctor shortage , poor emergency care crippling Hyderabad government hospitals ,
articles.summary: Raising concern over the deteriorating state of public healthcare in the State capital, the Hyderabad City unit of the Human Rights Forum (HRF) has urged the Telangana government to take immediate measures to address shortage of doctors, inadequacy of infrastructure and poor emergency services across major government hospitals here. articles.title: Sudan : Drone Strike Kills 10 in El Obeid As Sudan War Escalates Across Darfur a
articles.summary: At least 10 civilians were killed in North Kordofan's capital of El Obeid on Monday evening when a paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) drone struck a residential area, hitting a family home and killing nine members of the same family, including women and children, according to eyewitnesses. Several neighbours were also wounded. Radio Dabanga was unable to reach the RSF for comment. The attack came as Sudan's war escalated sharply at the start

articles.title: Aleppo clashes kill four amid Syria SDF integration talks
articles.summary: Four killed in Aleppo clashes as Syria seeks deal with Kurdish SDF forces At least four people were killed as clashes broke out in Aleppo, with Syrian forces and the Kurdish led SDF trading blame amid stalled integration talks. Soldiers from the Public Security walk in Aleppo, Syria, April 3, 2025. ( photo credit : REUTERS/MAHMOUD HASSANO )

articles.title: Govt borrows 2nd - largest 164 . 5 tr won in temporary loans from BOK in 2025 :
articles.summary: (Herald) The government borrowed the second-largest amount of temporary funds on record from the central bank last year through its overdraft facility, data showed Wednesday. According to the data from the Bank of Korea submitted to Rep. Park Sung-hoon of the main opposition People Power Party, the government's temporary borrowings from the BOK totaled 164.5 trillion won ($113.65 billion) in 2025, including 5 trillion won drawn in December.
